name: endlessTower
description:
a tilebased love2d Roguelike game

This is a very early version of a roguelike game I've been working on. I mostly stopped working on games but! i actually have projects planned with some nice art!

Here's like in-between my next level of skill I've made while I've been getting better at making games.

I will finish this version but a mac port may never happen. I'm am currently waiting on a renew of my apple development certificate.

Controls

SelectEnterPausepQuickmenunMovementarrowsAttackwasdNext ItemeLast Itemq

Premise

You are basically going in-between floors until you reach the exit the idea is to collect items and get stronger so you can make it to floor ten. 

every floor gets larger and has a different look.
